content.description: Climb the face between the off width on the left and the twin cracks. Don't touch those cracks! Use tricky, delicate moves on small chickenheads and ledges to get you up
content.protection: Two bolt anchor on top. Same for twin cracks and metate crack
content.location: The face between the off width on the left and the twin cracks

content.description: Climb the twin, left leaning cracks. Mostly finger size or smaller. The left crack will take you all the way up, but the right  as you reach the lip. Each crack is it's own route too, but for this one you can use both to get you up. Fun start. You can do a sitting start underneath the blocks and flakes to make it a 5.11
content.protection: Probably can protect with really tiny nuts or microstoppers, but mostly done on top rope
content.location: Obvious twin cracks on the north side, can't miss them

content.description: The off width corner on the left side of the twin cracks
content.location: Off width corner left of the twin cracks

content.description: The north side of the boulderland area. Counter clockwise, starts at about the twin cracks area. This area includes a couple good cracks that are and some face climbs. Good area to do a few routes without moving your packs too much
